lastSession.summary: Added handoff system for multi-session task execution with cross-platform Python hooks.

shipped.summary: Add handoff system for multi-session task execution with cross-platform hooks
Improve /think --gpt with structured context, focused questions, and synchronous codex execution
Ensure Python 3.8 compatibility and clarify installation prerequisites in README
Add /reflect pre-mortem command with auto-detect for uncommitted vs recent commits
Enhance /ui to detect visual polish issues and AI-generated look patterns
Rebalance /ui audit toward visual/component quality, reduce accessibility dominance
Auto-install terminal-notifier on macOS via Homebrew during install
Add desktop notifications on task completion, merge hooks repo into unified installer
Slim all commands ~55% to reduce context usage, trust Claude's intelligence
/think: recommend optimal approach, track large tasks in state.json for session continuity
